<Label fx:id="dialog" minHeight="-Infinity" style="-fx-label-padding: 5; -fx-background-color: rgb(204, 255, 255); -fx-background-radius: 12;" text="Label" wrapText="true" />
<Pane maxHeight="-Infinity" maxWidth="-Infinity" minHeight="-Infinity" minWidth="-Infinity" prefHeight="60.0" prefWidth="60.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 1000;">
